name: ANUBIS (JasperConley)
description: ANUBIS is a Tron-inspired 3rd person adventure game where you play as the Egyptian god Anubis. When you begin in the underworld, you find the underworld in ruin. Anubis must find out what has happened to the town you are in and save the souls that are lost in it. Watch out for dangerous obstacles while you save the souls and reach the ultimate goal, the glowing pyramid.
